Description:
Scribblenauts Unmasked: A DC Comics Adventure takes the protagonist of the series, Maxwell boy, into the world of comics DC, where he will help the famous superheroes thwart famous villains using super powers of imagination. He will be in Gotham, Metropolis, Atlantis, where he will meet with Batman, Superman and other representatives of the Justice League. Heroes will confront The Joker, Lex Luthor, Sinestro and other famous villains. 
Thanks to a set of tools Super Hero Creator, players can create a never before seen characters, for example, Wonder Joker or Bane-Lantern, change the look of the heroes or super powers, and then share with other players in your creations.
